name: Connect Master - Pair Matching
description:
Connect Master is the latest evolution in the tile matching games and pair matching puzzles with fun and relaxing gameplay. Tile connect and tile master puzzles will make your brain work while relaxing. Goal of the game is connecting pairs of matching tiles. From the creators of Brain Test Tricky Puzzles, Brain Test 2 Tricky Stories and Who Is? Tricky Riddles!
Find the matching tiles and connect the pairs with up to 3 lines. This pair matching game is among the best free puzzle games with onet connect game mechanics. This addictive pair matching puzzle game is one of popular brain teaser games.

Play Connect Master to take away your day’s stress and enjoy connecting thousands of artistic tiles. Players can either go for a relaxing matching experience or push the limits with combo match feature. With this tile connect game test your skills and intelligence by solving the tile puzzles. This game is not just about onnect, but also connect pleasures.

Unlimited Play with Lots of Unique Levels
There are 1000s of levels for players to complete this tile match adventure. Even though there are a lot of matching tiles, no 2 levels are the same and it will always feel like a new challenge for the onnect and tile app masters. There are dozens of unique features such as bombs, joker tiles, changing gravity conditions, frozen tiles and many more! You can pair 1000 times, but each pairing is unique unlike other tile match games with connections.

Combo System
Play at your own connect pace or challenge your skills by making connections fast and increase your pair combos. By increasing your combo count, you will also get bonus points and prove yourself as one of the best Connect Masters in the world of free matching games.

Leaderboard
Tile connecting can be a competitive business and our solid leaderboards will satisfy your competitive match and pair needs. Show your skills against other tile matching and tile connect puzzle gamers. Become the king of onnect and connect!

Artistic Visuals and Customization
Dozens of tile graphics and backgrounds are created by our classic match artists to give the maximum pleasure. Our food pair tiles will make you hungry, while our natural backgrounds will bring fresh air to your room. Players are also able to customize which visual elements they want to see while playing the game. There are dozens of free tiles to choose from.

Boosters
Pick one of the 4 effective boosters to help you complete levels faster. Use freeze time, bomb, hint or shuffle to make tile matching a breeze. Tile match connect games have never seen such a booster variety with onnect, onet and match pair tile apps.

Duel Mode
If you get bored of playing the game as a single player, delve into our duel mode. Never seen before in a tile connect game, this mode allows you to play against another player on the same board and the one who collects the most stars wins the match. Who pairs the best? Whose tile is stronger? Can you match all onnects and connects against your opponents?

Features:
● %100 free to play, no hidden fees.
● Relaxing gameplay and serene visuals.
● Pair Matching Puzzle and Tile Connect.
● Match and connect pairs of the same kind images.
● Onnect Pair matching game and onet match puzzle.
● The latest iteration of the tile connect and tile match puzzle genres.
● More than 5000 levels in this onet 3D classic link puzzle games.
● Fun matching game with cool challenges and brain teasers.
● Unique levels with different obstacles and features.
● Competitive combo system.
● Vast customization options.
● Duel mode to play against other players.
● Play offline, play without the internet.
● Fun for all ages: The best game for family & friends’ gatherings!
● Download this funny game for free.
● Great exercise for the brain.
● Simple and highly addictive game play.

Have fun!
